title: Interakt
shortDescription: Convert your visitors into loyal customers with live chat, notifications, and more.
longDescription:
# Customer analysis, marketing, and support. Simplified.
Our integrated CRM, email marketing and live chat allow you to engage, retain and support your customers from one single dashboard.

## Capture. Engage. Retain.

Interakt is a simple All-in-One Customer Engagement platform. With Interakt you can import and manage all your Leads & Users, send Emails campaigns, create powerful web & push notifications, resolve helpdesk tickets, help site visitors through Live-Chat and provide the ease of a FAQ page to all your customers.

## Features

### 360° Lead Capture

Capture Leads in every possible way. Import existing leads, divide them into segments and nurture them in real-time.

### Consolidate User Data

Capture user sessions, activities & dynamics with rich profiling for every user. Create segments and track their progress.

### Powerful Email Automation

Customize and track your automated marketing & transactional emails.

### Engage With Live Chat

Engage with your visitors and provide live support to existing users with the Interakt chat widget.

### Keep Users Informed

Announce new features or target segments with special offers and web notifications.

### Gather Feedback & Retain

Create feedback forms to gather suggestions, ideas, & issues.
instructions:
This app account requires a free Interakt account.
Sign up now
author: Fizzy Software Pvt. Ltd.

categories.title: Recommended For Stores
categories.description: Apps for stores in the recommendation engine.

categories.title: Social & Communication
categories.description: Apps that make it easier to communicate with your customers.

categories.title: Marketing
categories.description: Promote content, collect email addresses, and increase engagement.

proposedApp.title: Interakt
proposedApp.longDescription:
INTERAKT

Interakt.co simplifies customer data analysis, marketing and support. Our integrated crm, email marketing and live chat allow you to engage, retain and support your customers from one single dashboard.

CAPTURE.ENGAGE.RETAIN

Interakt is a simple All-in-One Customer Engagement platform. With Interakt you can import and manage all your Leads & Users, send Emails campaigns, create powerful web & push notifications, resolve helpdesk tickets, help site visitors through Live-Chat and provide the ease of a FAQ page to all your customers.

360° LEAD CAPTURE

Capture Leads in every possible way. Import existing leads, divide them into segments and nurture them in real-time.

CONSOLIDATE USER DATA

Capture user sessions, activities & dynamics with rich profiling for every user. Create segments and track their progress.

POWERFUL EMAIL AUTOMATION

Customize templates to send automated marketing & transactional emails. Engage users and view email stats.

ENGAGE WITH LIVE CHAT

Engage visitors & provide live support to existing users. Use a customizable chat window or the offline mode.

KEEP USERS INFORMED

Announce new features or target segments with special offers. Use customizable & trackable web notifications.

GATHER FEEDBACK & RETAIN

Create feedback forms to gather suggestions, ideas, & issues. Analyze all this in one place to improve.
proposedApp.instructions:
Install and Configure Interakt-

Step 1
Create an Interakt account and login
Create a new project for your website hosted on CloudFlare
Navigate to Settings->API->click "copy code" for App Id

Step 2
After successfully creating an account and a project on interakt.co, login to your CloudFlare account
In 'Apps' section, search for the Interakt app 
Click on the app, click preview
Paste the app-Id copied from Interakt account on install page 
Click on install button
proposedApp.author: Fizzy Software Pvt. Ltd.

proposedApp.title: Interakt
proposedApp.longDescription:
INTERAKT

Interakt.co simplifies customer data analysis, marketing and support. Our integrated crm, email marketing and live chat allow you to engage, retain and support your customers from one single dashboard.

CAPTURE.ENGAGE.RETAIN

Interakt is a simple All-in-One Customer Engagement platform. With Interakt you can import and manage all your Leads & Users, send Emails campaigns, create powerful web & push notifications, resolve helpdesk tickets, help site visitors through Live-Chat and provide the ease of a FAQ page to all your customers.

360° LEAD CAPTURE

Capture Leads in every possible way. Import existing leads, divide them into segments and nurture them in real-time.

CONSOLIDATE USER DATA

Capture user sessions, activities & dynamics with rich profiling for every user. Create segments and track their progress.

POWERFUL EMAIL AUTOMATION

Customize templates to send automated marketing & transactional emails. Engage users and view email stats.

ENGAGE WITH LIVE CHAT

Engage visitors & provide live support to existing users. Use a customizable chat window or the offline mode.

KEEP USERS INFORMED

Announce new features or target segments with special offers. Use customizable & trackable web notifications.

GATHER FEEDBACK & RETAIN

Create feedback forms to gather suggestions, ideas, & issues. Analyze all this in one place to improve.
proposedApp.instructions:
Install and Configure Interakt-

Prerequisite:

An account on Interakt (You can start for free).

STEP 1-

Login to your Interakt account.
Create a new project for your website hosted on CloudFlare.
Navigate to Settings->API->click "copy code" for App Id.

STEP 2-

After successfully creating an account and a project on interakt.co, login to your CloudFlare account.
In 'Apps' section, search for the Interakt app.
Click on the app, click Preview.
Paste the app-Id copied from Interakt account on the install page.
Click on install button.
proposedApp.author: Fizzy Software Pvt. Ltd.

appid.description: Get App-ID from your Interakt Account.
appid.title: App Id

proposedApp.title: Interakt
proposedApp.shortDescription: Live Chat, Helpdesk, Emails, Notifications, Leads, Users
proposedApp.longDescription:
INTERAKT

Interakt.co simplifies customer data analysis, marketing and support. Our integrated crm, email marketing and live chat allow you to engage, retain and support your customers from one single dashboard.

CAPTURE.ENGAGE.RETAIN

Interakt is a simple All-in-One Customer Engagement platform. With Interakt you can import and manage all your Leads & Users, send Emails campaigns, create powerful web & push notifications, resolve helpdesk tickets, help site visitors through Live-Chat and provide the ease of a FAQ page to all your customers.

360° LEAD CAPTURE

Capture Leads in every possible way. Import existing leads, divide them into segments and nurture them in real-time.

CONSOLIDATE USER DATA

Capture user sessions, activities & dynamics with rich profiling for every user. Create segments and track their progress.

POWERFUL EMAIL AUTOMATION

Customize templates to send automated marketing & transactional emails. Engage users and view email stats.

ENGAGE WITH LIVE CHAT

Engage visitors & provide live support to existing users. Use a customizable chat window or the offline mode.

KEEP USERS INFORMED

Announce new features or target segments with special offers. Use customizable & trackable web notifications.

GATHER FEEDBACK & RETAIN

Create feedback forms to gather suggestions, ideas, & issues. Analyze all this in one place to improve.
proposedApp.instructions:
Install and Configure Interakt-

Prerequisite:

An account on Interakt (You can start for free).

Steps -

Sign up or log in on Interakt.
Select a project or create a new one.
Navigate to Settings->API->click "copy code" for App Id.
Paste it down here, preview and click install.
proposedApp.author: Fizzy Software Pvt. Ltd.

appID.description:
Your App ID can found by viewing your Interakt project
Settings › API › “Copy Code”
appID.title: App ID
